page.title: 18RUTH'S DAY- SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: My day begins at 8am when I get up for school.I wash and dress myself and then eat my breakfast.Before going to school I get my baby rabbit out of his hutch. I either walk to school or cycle with my mum who is a housewife. If it is raining I usually go in the car with my dad if he hasn't already left for work.He works either at a factory or he helps with work on removals.It is about three quarters of a mile to school.The bell goes at 9am and then we have registration and assembly.At lunchtime I have my own sandwiches.School finishes at 3.30pm and if I am not staying for a club I arrive home at about 3.55pm.I then get changed and play with my friend from next door.Instead of having tea in the afternoon we have dinner as all my family have sandwiches in the middle of the day.I go to bed at 9.30-10.00.
